actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

official_title: To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to prohibit the taking of any endangered species or threatened species of fish or wildlife in the United States as a trophy and the importation of any such trophy into the United States, and for other purposes.
short_title: Cecil the Lion Endangered and Threatened Species Act of 2015

titles.title: Cecil the Lion Endangered and Threatened Species Act of 2015

To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to prohibit the taking of any endangered species or threatened species of fish or wildlife in the United States as a trophy and the importation of any such trophy into the United States, and for other purposes.
